title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.2 - Appearances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.2 - Appearances

State Regulations

Any person so aggrieved by a determination of a local
board may appear and present his case in person, or by duly appointed
representative, and may submit affidavits or produce evidence under oath
relative and material to the review of the action taken by the local board. The
applicant must appear in person on the date set forth in the notice given him, and on all adjourned dates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
52.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
